body_content.explanation: abbreviation for equality, diversity, inclusion, and belonging: the idea that all people should have equal rights and treatment and be welcomed and included by an organization, so that they do not experience any disadvantage because of belonging to a particular group:
examples: The acronym EDIB refers to our efforts to build a workplace that is inclusive, equitable, supportive, and welcoming.
A new EDIB director has been appointed to work across all departments of the university.
